Name: minimize_total_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort of all tasks in the active sprint.

Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize the cumulative availability of all workers in the team.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_score
Description: Maximize the total priority score of features included in the release.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the total severity of active blockers impacting the sprint.

Name: maximize_velocity_consistency
Description: Maximize the team's velocity (avg. story points) to be consistent with historical trend.

Name: minimize_context_switching
Description: Minimize the number of different features a single worker is assigned to in a sprint.

Name: maximize_skill_task_match
Description: Maximize the overall match between worker skills and task requirements.

Name: minimize_sprint_overcommit
Description: Minimize the difference between committed story points and historical velocity.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the influence level of stakeholders satisfied by the release plan.
